law.catch_line: Board of Pharmacy not to prohibit sale and dispensing of laetrile.
law.text: The Kentucky Board of Pharmacy shall make no rule or regulation which would prohibit the sale and dispensing of amygdalin (laetrile) by a duly licensed pharmacist.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1980.
